raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I noticed that in every major sport except for baseball, more than half of the players are people of color. Unlike the coaches, with the majority being mostly white. 
What do you Wonder?
I wonder if the year that the data was taken affected the results because of the world diversifying. 
What is the impact on my community?
Sports slowly becoming more diverse helps my community because of the idolization of different races to inspire some young people of color to strive for being a professional athlete or coach.

Diversity is quickly escalating in the recent years of professional sports.
ace_sentences: In every major sport except baseball, more than half of the players are people of color.
In these sports, most coaches are white people.
The data was taken in a certain year.
I wonder whether the year of the data affected the results.
Professional sports are becoming more diverse slowly.
Some young people of color idolize athletes of different races.
This idolization inspires some young people of color.
Some young people of color strive to become professional athletes.
Some young people of color strive to become coaches.
Diversity in professional sports has increased in recent years.
